      • angleDiffDegrees

        public static double angleDiffDegrees(double alpha,
                                      double beta)
        Calculates the difference between two angles given in degrees. A positive result indicates that the second angle is further counterclockwise.
        Parameters:
        alpha - first angle
        beta - second angle
        Returns:
        difference in degrees between -180 and +180

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double getRelativeCoordinates(double xaxis,
                                                                  java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double coords)
        Returns the given coordinates converted into the drone's coordinate system. Drone's coordinate system means that the facing direction is the y axis.
